product_name: FalconGuides Best Easy Day Hikes: Cape Cod and the Islands - 2nd Edition
long_description: The updated Best Easy Day Hikes: Cape Cod and the Islands features concise descriptions and easy-to-follow maps for 23 short hikes on Cape Cod, Nantucket and Martha's Vineyard.
short_description: The updated Best Easy Day Hikes: Cape Cod and the Islands features concise descriptions and easy-to-follow maps for 23 short hikes on Cape Cod, Nantucket and Martha's Vineyard.
